title: Greenvolt Next delivers solar farm for Sanofi, Waterford
description: Renewable energy solutions specialist Greenvolt Next, part of Greenvolt Group, has completed the development of a 4 MW solar PV plant for biopharmaceutical firm Sanofi in Co Waterford.
content:
Renewable energy solutions specialist Greenvolt Next, part of Greenvolt Group, has completed the development of a 4 MW solar PV plant for biopharmaceutical firm Sanofi in Co Waterford.
